title: Implement TUI with pi-tui
description:
Create src/tui/index.ts with:
- Use @mariozechner/pi-tui
- Header component (session info, model, tokens)
- Message area with markdown rendering
- Editor component for input
- Footer status line
- Integration with Agent

title: Implement read tool via Just Bash
description:
Create src/tools/read.ts with:
- read(path, offset?, limit?) function
- Uses cat/sed via Just Bash
- Logs to AgentFS
- Returns file contents

title: Implement bash tool via Just Bash
description:
Create src/tools/bash.ts with:
- bash(command) function
- Uses Just Bash with AgentFS backend
- Logs command and result
- Returns stdout, stderr, exitCode

title: Implement LLM Provider abstraction
description:
Create src/agent/provider.ts with:
- LLMProvider interface
- Support for Anthropic, OpenAI, Kimi providers
- Use Vercel AI SDK (ai package)
- streamText integration

title: Implement CLI argument parsing
description:
Create src/cli.ts with:
- Parse command line arguments
- Support: -c (continue), -r (resume), --provider, --model, --no-session
- Interactive mode
- Print mode (-p)
- Help display

title: Implement write tool via AgentFS
description:
Create src/tools/write.ts with:
- write(path, content) function
- Uses AgentFS SDK directly (avoids escape issues)
- Creates parent directories
- Logs to AgentFS

title: Implement edit tool
description:
Create src/tools/edit.ts with:
- edit(path, oldText, newText) function
- Reads via Just Bash
- TypeScript replacement (exact match)
- Writes via AgentFS
- Validates unique match
- Returns diff

title: Implement Config management module
description:
Create src/config/index.ts with:
- Config interface (provider, model, thinking)
- loadConfig() function
- saveConfig() function
- Support for global (~/.zi/settings.json) and project (.zi/settings.json) configs

title: Wire everything together in entry point
description:
Update src/index.ts and src/cli.ts to:
- Initialize config
- Create session
- Initialize provider
- Set up tools
- Create agent
- Start TUI or print mode

title: Implement Session management with AgentFS
description:
Create src/agent/session.ts with:
- Session interface (fs, kv, tools, id, path)
- Session.create() - Creates new .db file
- Session.load(id) - Loads existing session
- Integration with agentfs-sdk
- Session storage at .zi/sessions/{id}.db

title: Add unit tests for tools
description:
Create tests for:
- read tool
- write tool
- edit tool (including error cases)
- bash tool
- Use Bun test runner

title: Implement Tool registry
description:
Create src/tools/index.ts with:
- Tool interface definition
- ToolRegistry class
- Register and retrieve tools
- Integration with all 4 tools (read, write, edit, bash)

title: Implement Agent core
description:
Create src/agent/index.ts with:
- Agent class
- prompt(message) method
- executeTool() method
- Stream LLM responses
- Parse tool calls
- Error handling and retries
- Integration with provider, session, and tools
